child_plan_rest.title: We offer the following child plans.

data.title: IME Child Annual Money Back Plan (IME Bal Kiran)
data.subtitle: IME Child Annual Money Back Plan is a combination of insurance and investment plan to help you secure your child's future. This is an annual money back policy with profit plan.
data.interest: IME Child Annual Money Back Plan (IME Bal Kiran)

Details.title: IME Child Annual Money Back Plan (IME Bal Kiran)

data.title: IME Child Endowment Plan (IME Bal Ujjwal)
data.subtitle: This policy allows to make provision for Children's Education or Marriage. Under this policy Sum Assured along with bonus is payable only at the end of the selected term.
data.interest: IME Child Endowment Plan (IME Bal Ujjwal)

Details.title: IME Child Endowment Plan (IME Bal Ujjwal)
Details.paragraph: This policy allows to make provision for Children's Education or Marriage. Under this policy Sum Assured along with bonus is payable only at the end of the selected term.

listitem.text: At Maturity: Sum assured plus bonus

data.title: IME Child Money Back Plan (IME Bal Umanga)
data.subtitle: This policy allows to make provision for Children's Education or Marriage. Under this policy, a Survival to Maturity benefit is paid in latest 5 installments starts from 4th Anniversary prior to Date of Maturity.
data.interest: IME Child Money Back Plan (IME Bal Umanga)

Details.title: IME Child Money Back Plan (IME Bal Umanga)
Details.paragraph: This policy allows to make provision for Children's Education or Marriage. Under this policy, a Survival to Maturity benefit is paid in latest 5 installments starts from 4th Anniversary prior to Date of Maturity.

listitem.text: Money Back Benefit in installments at the last 5 years of maturity
Remaining Sum assured plus bonus in case of the maturity
Sum assured plus bonus will be paid to nominated person in case of death of the assured.

whole life_plan_rest.title: We offer the following whole life plans.

data.title: IME Endowment cum Whole Life Plan (IME Aajeevan Sawadhik Beema Yojana)
data.subtitle: IME Aajeevan Sawadhik Beema Yojana is one of the best products. Basically this plan is a unique combination of Whole Life Plan and Endowment Assurance Plan. It provides financial protection against death throughout the lifetime or 99 years of age of the life assured even after maturity payment.
data.interest: IME Endowment cum Whole Life Plan (IME Aajeevan Sawadhik Beema Yojana)

Details.title: IME Endowment cum Whole Life Plan (IME Aajeevan Sawadhik Beema Yojana)
Details.paragraph: IME Aajeevan Sawadhik Beema Yojana is one of the best products. Basically this plan is a unique combination of Whole Life Plan and Endowment Assurance Plan. It provides financial protection against death throughout the lifetime or 99 years of age of the life assured even after maturity payment.

listitem.text: On Death within Policy Term: FULL SUM ASSURED + BONUS
On Death after Policy Maturity: FULL SUM ASSURED

data.title: IME Money Back Cum Whole Life Plan (IME Kalpandhan)
data.subtitle: This plan covers the risk of life assured for whole life. This product provides the partial payment in certain time interval to life assured and the bonus at the end of the term and after demise of life assured the nominee gets the benefits of Sum Assured.
data.interest: IME Money Back Cum Whole Life Plan (IME Kalpandhan)

Details.title: IME Money Back Cum Whole Life Plan (IME Kalpandhan)
Details.paragraph: This plan covers the risk of life assured for whole life. This product provides the partial payment in certain time interval to life assured and the bonus at the end of the term and after demise of life assured the nominee gets the benefits of Sum Assured. Under this policy, a survival to maturity benefit is paid in installments as given below table depending on term of the policy can be taken for 10th, 12th, 15th, 20th and 25th years.

listitem.text: Max. Entry Age: 60, 58, 55, 50, 45 years (for money back term of 10, 12, 15, 20 and 25 years)
Premium payment frequency: Single, Yearly, Half Yearly, Quarterly
Maximum Sum Assured: According to the income source of life to be Assured
Whole life Maturity at age of 99 years : Sum Assured
Remaining Sum assured plus bonus in case of the maturity
Sum assured plus bonus will be paid to nominated person in case of death of the assured.
Accidental Death benefits: Available up to maximum 50 lakh
PTD/ PWB Benefits: Waiver of Premium/ Monthly income benefit if total permanent disability occurs due to accident.
Surrender value and policy loan is allowed.

annual_plan_rest.title: We offer the following annual cash back plans.

data.title: IME Annual Cash Back Plan(5%)
data.subtitle: Annual Money Back Plan is participating anticipated endowment plan. This plan is especially for those who wants the annual return back money in yearly basis. In this case 5% of Sum Assured will be provided to Policy holder every year at time of renewal.

Details.title: IME Annual Cash Back Plan(5%)
Details.paragraph: Annual Money Back Plan is participating anticipated endowment plan. This plan is especially for those who wants the annual return back money in yearly basis. In this case 5% of Sum Assured will be provided to Policy holder every year at time of renewal.

listitem.text: 5% of sum assured will be returned back to assured annually.
Remaining sum assured plus bonus in case of the maturity.
Sum assured plus bonus will be paid to nominated person in case of death of the assured.

money back_plan_rest.title: We offer following money back plans.

data.title: IME Limited Payment Money Back Plan (Dhanbriksha Jeewan Beema Yojana)
data.subtitle: This Policy allows to make provision for recurring expenses. Under this policy, a survival to maturity benefit is paid in installments in every 10th, 15th, 20th and 25th year depending on the term of the policy.
data.interest: IME Limited Payment Money Back Plans

Details.title: IME Limited Payment Money Back Plan (Dhanbriksha Jeewan Beema Yojana)

listitem.text: This Policy allows to make provision for recurring expenses. Under this policy, a survival to maturity benefit is paid in installments in every 10th, 15th, 20th and 25th year depending on the term of the policy. The portion of each installment shall be paid on 8, 12, 16, and 20 years respectively of the sum assured depending on the term of the policy.
Based on the Sum Assured amount
Rs. 1 per Thousand for the amount above Rs. 2,10,000.00 upto 5,00,000.00
Rs. 2 per Thousand for the amount Rs. 5,10,000.00 and above.
Based on the Mode of Payment-
For Half Yearly Payment: 1% but No Discounts given for Quarterly Payment Mode.
Remaining Sum assured plus bonus in case of the maturity
Sum assured plus bonus will be paid to nominated person in case of death of the assured.

data.title: IME Dhanbardhan Money Back Plan
data.subtitle: This Policy allows to make provision for recurring expenses. Under this policy, a survival to maturity benefit is paid in installments in every 10th, 15th, 20th and 25th year depending on the term of the policy.

listitem.text: Maximum Entry Age : 55, 50, 45 Years for 15,20,25 years term respectively
Remaining Sum assured plus bonus in case of the maturity
Sum assured plus bonus will be paid to nominated person in case of death of the assured.

endowment_plan_rest.title: We offer the following endowment plans.

data.title: IME Simple Endowment Plan ( IME Saral Sawadhik Beema Yojana)
data.subtitle: It is the most popular form of life assurance since it makes provision for the family of the assured in the event of early death, as also assures a lump sum amount at the desired age.
data.interest: IME Simple Endowment Plan ( IME Saral Sawadhik Bima Yojana)

Details.title: IME Simple Endowment Plan ( IME Saral Sawadhik Bima Yojana)
Details.paragraph: It is the most popular form of life assurance since it makes provision for the family of the assured in the event of early death, as also assures a lump sum amount at a desired age. The amount assured, if not paid by reason of earlier death becomes payable at the end of the policy term. Premiums are payable for a term of years equal to the endowment term or until death if it occurs within this period.

listitem.text: Maximum Sum Assured: According to the income source of life to be Assured
Sum assured plus bonus in case of the maturity
Sum assured plus bonus will be paid to nominated person in case of death of the assured.

data.title: IME Group Endowment Plan
data.subtitle: IME Group Endowment Scheme offers employees insurance protection throughout their service and a lump sum cash amount upon retirement if they survive until then.

Details.title: IME Group Endowment Plan
Details.paragraph: IME Group Endowment Scheme is a unique saving and protection scheme through which the employees of an employer can enjoy insurance protection throughout their service and also get a lump sum cash amount upon their retirement if they survive up to retirement. Each employee is offered insurance coverage, which can be a fixed amount or linked to their designation or salary.

listitem.text: Maximum Sum Assured: No Limit (Subject to Underwriting)

data.title: IME Limited Payment Endowment Plan (IME Sabal Jeevan Beema Yojana)
data.subtitle: This Policy allows to make provision for recurring expenses. Under this policy, a survival to maturity benefit is paid in installments in every 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th year depending on the term of the policy.
data.interest: IME Limited Payment Endowment Plan (IME Sabal Jeevan Beema Yojana)

Details.title: IME Limited Payment Endowment Plan (IME Sabal Jeevan Beema Yojana)
Details.paragraph: This Policy allows to make provision for recurring expenses. Under this policy, a survival to maturity benefit is paid in installments every 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th year depending on the term of the policy. The premium payment frequency is 3 or 5 times depending on the policy term.

listitem.text: Premium Payment Frequency:  3 or 5 times depending on the policy terms
On Death within Policy Term: FULL SUM ASSURED + BONUS
On Death after Policy Maturity: FULL SUM ASSURED
Monthly Income Benefit / Permanent Total Disability Benefit
